entry.title: Vite report on Mon, 13 Nov 2023 20:02:08
entry.summary:
Tech:
- OpenAI recruiters offering $10 million pay packets to lure Google AI employees
- Ford's latest innovation in truck tailgate wars
- DoorDash drivers unhappy with new feature pressuring customers to tip
- Elon Musk's SpaceX predicted to be worth half a trillion dollars by 2030
- Amazon offering remote and in-office career opportunities
- How to watch Cricket World Cup live streams
- Shekel Mobility raises $7M for B2B marketplace in Africa
- Weekly Roundup of hot topics in workplace, SharePoint, and power platform
- CSS-only Ribbon Shapes collection
- Cyber intrusion that halted DP World ports in Australia remains a mystery
- IT and security leaders advised on striking the right budget balance
- Startup making it easy to launch rewards credit cards for businesses
- Questlove's YouTube series explores curiosity about peers
- Facebook's missed detection of planning for January 6 riots
- College students demanding schools cut ties with Starbucks ahead of Red Cup Day
- Easy-to-use tool for creating maps
- SiriusXM unveils new logo in hopes of attracting new listeners
- Mississippi jails over 800 people awaiting psychiatric treatment
- Inside look at fake AirPods compared to real ones
- Android Telecom Library simplifies creation of voice and video apps
- Creating React JS ChatGPT bots in minutes
- Gartner forecasts $679 billion spending on public cloud in 2024
- Bionic tights aiding patients with MS in walking
- Mississippi leaders honor Medgar Evers with Medal
- Kernel developer fixes stylus compatibility on newer kernels

Business:
- United States Open Access Journal Publishing thriving with 15% market share
- Mortgage interest rates decreasing
- Funeral directors share etiquette rules and pet peeves
- Hiring landscape of jobs at Amazon remains fluid

AI:
- OpenAI recruiters offering $10 million pay packets to lure Google AI employees
- Elon Musk's SpaceX predicted to be worth half a trillion dollars by 2030
- Android Telecom Library simplifies creation of voice and video apps
- Creating React JS ChatGPT bots in minutes

Insights:
- The tech industry is highly competitive, with companies like OpenAI and SpaceX offering lucrative incentives to attract top talent.
- The truck tailgate wars highlight the constant innovation and competition in the automotive industry.
- DoorDash's new feature raises concerns about the treatment of drivers and the pressure on customers to tip.
- Amazon's hiring landscape reflects the changing nature of work, with both remote and in-office opportunities available.
- The rise of fake AirPods highlights the ongoing issue of counterfeit products in the market.
- The Mississippi jail system's failure to meet state standards for psychiatric treatment raises concerns about the treatment of individuals with mental health issues.
- The Gartner forecast for public cloud spending indicates the continued growth and adoption of cloud technologies.
- The development of bionic tights showcases the potential of technology to improve the lives of individuals with disabilities.
- The recognition of Medgar Evers by Mississippi leaders highlights the importance of honoring civil rights activists and their contributions.
- The kernel developer's fix for stylus compatibility demonstrates the collaborative nature of the open-source community.
